metadata.name: British Army Foot Pwr 2 mL 59mL Liquid

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Use for drying skin before or after surgical removal of warts or where dryness is required

contraindications.disease: Acute oral toxicity LD50 42 mg kg Mouse

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Calcium carbimide is combined with Formaldehyde
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Disulfiram is combined with Formaldehyde
